trends: There has been one other sighting in Kyoto
There were no other sightings in Kyoto on or around July 15th 1949
Summary: While stationed in Kyoto, Japan I saw something in the sky.
divs: Sighting DetailsThis thing in the sky lasted for about an hour,I checked it with the side of the building and it stayed in the same place.It might have been a weather ballon but in the area where I saw it there wasn't any weather stations that I knew of. The reason I saw it was because I had some pigeons behind my girlfriends house and I was alwys looking skyward. The object stayed in the same place for over an hour.I wasn't sure what it was.When I came out later it was gone. I looked for it every day after that and never saw it again. If it was a weather baloon I figued it would appear again at the same time. The address of the house in Kyoto was 10 Higashi Fukunokwa Okazaki Kyoto, Japan.I'm not sure of the date but it was in the summer. The area was in the city and consisted of regular houses.
